Configuration.Name: AutoRenew
Configuration.Author: Andrew Morgan
Configuration.Description: Processes items that have been renewed (or not) by the lending library automatically and notifies patrons.

Setting.name: RenewEmail
Setting.Description: Name of e-mail to be sent when a renewal is granted.

Setting.name: DenyEmail
Setting.Description: Name of e-mail to be sent when a renewal is denied.

Setting.name: LibraryUseEmail
Setting.Description: Name of e-mail to be sent to the Borrowing Manager when an in-library use only item is renewed so the due date can be updated while it is on the shelf. Alternatively, you could use this to send a different e-mail to the patron for in-library use only items.

Setting.name: Exclusions
Setting.Description: NVTGCs to exclude from AutoRenew. Enclose in single quotes, and multiple NVTGCs with commas. Example: 'ex1', 'ex2', 'ex3'
